data.title: General Job Application
data.meta_description: Apply to General Job Application at RATP Dev Middle East & North Africa in United Arab Emirates.
data.text:
RATP Dev operates and maintains urban and intercity transportation systems on four continents, in order to make distances shorter, boost regional economies and bring people together. We are where you are and where you want to go.

RATP Dev Middle East have operations around the region and we welcome talented professionals who have expertise in designing, deploying, and managing every part of the mobility chain â€” from operations to service and maintenance.

If you understand customised solutions that redefine the urban landscape and you are passionate about making travel more enjoyable around the world then you have come to the right company for an exciting career move.

We have job opportunities available right now across the region. You can apply directly via the links below for opportunities in Saudi Arabia, Qatar and Egypt. Our talent acquisition teams are working hard to review all applications and will respond at the earliest possible time if your profile matches our requirements.

Capital Metro Company (CAMCO) - a joint ownership between RATP Dev and the Saudi Public Transport Company (SAPTCO).

RKH Qitarat - a consortium between RATPDev, Keolis and Hamad Group Trading.

RATP Dev Mobility Cairo (RDMC) - a subsidiary of RATP Group.

We also invite you to apply to this general job application if you feel the jobs we have advertised do not match your profile perfectly however you believe you have solid experience within our sector that could add value in the future.

Some key areas of expertise we are always interested in reviewing with either metro, rail, bus or tramway experience are as follows:

General Management.

Technical.

Operations.

Maintenance.

Customer Service.

Rail Safety.

Thank you for your interest in working with RATP Dev Middle East and our subsidiaries. For opportunities in our global business please feel free to explore the following sites:

RATP Dev Global

RATP Dev London

RATP Dev USA

All the best,

The Talent Acquisition Team
